name: CMPedometer
desc: An object for fetching the system-generated live walking data.

items.name: class func isStepCountingAvailable() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether step counting is available on the current device.

items.name: class func isDistanceAvailable() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether distance estimation is available on the current device.

items.name: class func isFloorCountingAvailable() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether floor counting is available on the current device.

items.name: class func isPaceAvailable() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether pace information is available on the current device.

items.name: class func isCadenceAvailable() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether cadence information is available on the current device.

items.name: class func isPedometerEventTrackingAvailable() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether pedometer events are available on the current device.

items.name: class func authorizationStatus() -> CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: Returns a value indicating whether the app is authorized to gather pedometer data.

items.name: enum CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The authorization status for motion-related features.

items.name: func startUpdates(from: Date, withHandler: CMPedometerHandler)
items.desc: Starts the delivery of recent pedestrian-related data to your app.

items.name: func stopUpdates()
items.desc: Stops the delivery of recent pedestrian data updates to your app.

items.name: func startEventUpdates(handler: CMPedometerEventHandler)
items.desc: Starts the delivery of pedometer events to your app.

items.name: func stopEventUpdates()
items.desc: Stops the delivery of pedometer events to your app.

items.name: typealias CMPedometerHandler
items.desc: A block for processing pedometer-related data.

items.name: typealias CMPedometerEventHandler
items.desc: A block for processing pedometer events.

items.name: func queryPedometerData(from: Date, to: Date, withHandler: CMPedometerHandler)
items.desc: Retrieves the data between the specified start and end dates.
